text: Léo Dubois (born 14 September 1994) is a French professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Ligue 1 club Lyon and the France national team. ==Club career== Dubois, playing for FC Nantes, made his Ligue 1 debut at 9 May 2015 against Girondins de Bordeaux in a 2–1 away defeat, replacing Kian Hansen after 83 minutes. Dubois joined Olympique Lyonnais on 1 July 2018. ==International career== Dubois was called up to the France senior team for the first time in May 2019. He made his debut on 2 June 2019 in a 2–0 friendly win against Bolivia, coming on for Benjamin Pavard in the 46th minute of the game. 9 days later, Dubois made his first start for the France senior team and played every minute of the match, in the UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying 4–0 away win over Andorra. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Nantes |2014–15 |rowspan="4"|Ligue 1 |2||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||2||0 |- |2015–16 |24||0||2||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||27||0 |- |2016–17 |36||0||2||0||3||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||41||0 |- |2017–18 |34||3||1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||35||3 |- !colspan="2"|Total !96!!3!!5!!0!!4!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!105!!3 |- |rowspan="3"|Lyon |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Ligue 1 |25||1||3||1||1||0||5||1||colspan="2" |—||34||3 |- |2019–20 |16||0||1||0||1||0||9||0||colspan="2" |—||27||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !41!!1!!4!!1!!2!!0!!14!!1!!colspan="2" |—!!61!!3 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !137!!4!!9!!1!!6!!0!!14!!1!!colspan="2" |—!!166!!6 |} ===International=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |+ Appearances and goals by national team and year |- !National team!!Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=2|France |2019||4||0 |- |2020||1||0 |- !colspan=2|Total||5||0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Maine-et- Loire Category:French footballers Category:France under-21 international footballers Category:France international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Nantes players Category:Olympique Lyonnais players Category:Ligue 1 players
